wikipedia_page.main: Catherine Clare Powell (born in 1967), is a British businesswoman. She is the Global Head of Hosting at Airbnb, having formerly been the President of the Disney Parks, Western Region (where she oversaw Disneyland, Walt Disney World, and Disneyland Paris).

response: In March 2018, a Disney Parks West regional division was formed with Disneyland Resort in California, Walt Disney World in Florida, and Disneyland Paris under Catherine Powell, outgoing Disneyland Paris president. This mirrors the Disney Parks East regional division consisting of Shanghai Disney Resort, Hong Kong Disneyland and Walt Disney Attractions Japan and headed by Michael Colglazier. Natacha Rafalski was promoted from chief financial officer to president for Disneyland Paris in December 2018. In September 2019, Powell exited her post as president of the park west division with division dissolving and Disneyland Paris transferred to Disney Parks International, East region reverting to its prior name.

response: * Catherine Powell, CEO of Disney Parks, Western Region

The Disneyland version was named one of Time magazine's "World's Greatest Places 2019". While the themed area initially drew crowds to the point of leaving the rest of Disneyland relatively empty, a drop in attendance after the first few months led to the resignation of Catherine Powell, who oversaw the U.S. and Paris themed areas. However, in October 2019, some visitors reported that Disney's Hollywood Studios area was crowded during their visit.
